name: Alone? (itch)
description:
This a text adventure which leads to several different ending can you figure out the way out of this lonely planet your in or will your world come to ending too quickly

Let's find out if you play the game don't be shy to share your ending I would really like some feedback on this xD

When you download the zip remember it is a html file so it will open in your browser just in case people think its a virus or something
